title: Need help with a khasi song
selftext:
Hi people, 

Would anyone be able to help me with understanding what this khasi song about... If you could help with translating the lyrics to English, that would be great. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3lg1Nqq6Jao

I tried searching on google, but it wasn't of much help. ðŸ¥²
